description: Try our easy to follow Chicken & Couscous Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken salad,Grape,Seafood free,Soy free,Egg free,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Chicken & Couscous Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine 1 tbs of lemon juice, oil and cumin in a bowl. Brush mixture over the chicken and set aside. Preheat a chargrill pan or barbecue on medium-high heat.
In a saucepan heat chicken stock until it starts simmering.
Place the couscous into a large bowl and pour over the hot stock. Stir well. Cover and stand for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, add chicken to the heated chargrill and cook for about 6 minutes each side until golden and cooked through. Transfer to a plate. Cover with foil.
Fluff couscous with a fork. Add herbs, garlic, grapes, pistachio and remaining lemon juice to couscous. Season.
Divide couscous salad among serving plates. Top with sliced chicken. Serve.
